rooms.description: A spacious entrance with reception area incorporating traditional Chettinad design elements such as intricate carvings and local stone finishes.
Expansive living area featuring comfortable seating arrangements, natural lighting from large west-facing windows and a blend of modern and traditional interior design.
Fully-equipped kitchen with state-of-the-art appliances, marble countertops, and ample storage, designed in harmony with Vastu guidelines ensuring proper placement of cooking areas.
Adjacent to the living room for a seamless dining experience, offering space for casual family meals and gatherings.
Spacious bedroom designed as a bachelor pad with modern amenities and a serene ambiance, ensuring privacy while embracing traditional architectural elements.
Dedicated media room featuring state-of-the-art audio-visual systems, comfortable seating for an immersive experience. Located away from noise-prone areas in accordance with Vastu principles.
Quiet study and reading area with built-in shelving and ambient lighting, fostering a conducive environment for concentration and relaxation.

openings.notes: Main entrance designed to welcome positive energy while adhering to Vastu principles.
Large east-facing windows for natural light and energy flow, balancing the west-facing plot orientation.
Balcony with views of the surrounding landscape, providing ventilation as per local building norms.

rooms.description: Spacious rooftop terrace offering panoramic views and serving as an outdoor relaxation space, designed with Chettinad-style elements including stone pathways and traditional landscaping.
